com.google.code.sagetvaddons.sagealert.shared
Interface NotificationServerSettings

All Superinterfaces:
com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.data.BeanModelTag, IsDataStoreSerializable, com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.IsSerializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
CsvLogFileSettings, EmailSettings, ExeServerSettings, GrowlServerSettings, TwitterSettings
public interface NotificationServerSettings
extends IsDataStoreSerializable, com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.IsSerializable, com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.data.BeanModelTag

All notification systems are initiated by an object that implements this interface. Basically, notification server settings must be transferable between the client (browser) and the SageAlert server so it must implement IsSerializable (see GWT docs for details on how to ensure that a class in indeed serializable in the GWT sense). And these objects are also stored in the SageAlert data store so they must also implement IsDataStoreSerializable.
